description:
Animated Presentation Maker


【NEW】Link: Support linking local HTML files. Can instantly open local web content like DeepSeek-generated mini-games within the software for immediate play and smoother creative experience!
【NEW】 Interactive Roles: Added voice call mode! Enable real-time voice communication with characters for more natural interactions.
【NEW】 Enhanced TTS System : Page upgraded, added Azure and ElevenLabs categorized voice packs.
Slide Show: 3D slide show function updated, optimized performance lag issues.
Roles: Added filter function in official character window for quick role searching.
Subtitles&Record: Optimized new recording insertion method (defaults to appending at timeline end).
Options: Optimized frame copy operation, added option to preserve nested frames.
Operations: Optimized asset movement/rotation on canvas.
Operations: Optimized top toolbar display on small screens, now supports mouse wheel scrolling.
Operations: Improved top toolbar layout and presentation for better user experience.
Text: Now supports Tab key for first-line paragraph indentation.
Bubbles: Adjusted default bubble size and font scaling, added adaptive height function.
Preview: Added virtual keyboard function, allows text input without physical keyboard.
Preview: Support page number jumps or use [Number Key + Enter] shortcut to locate preview pages.
Roles: Added multiple new character assets.
Animations: Fixed decimal time value setting issue when editing multiple animations simultaneously.
Animations: Restored original default settings for smudge effect.
General: Fixed other known issues.
